name: NIGHTSTAR: Rogue Wings
detailed_description:
A decade ago, the robotic forces of the Absolute Unity slaughtered the ones who opposed its supreme control over the Galaxy. This fateful period is known as the Division War. The few lucky survivors were enslaved or banished to the Outer Planets. Moved by their ever-growing hunger for power, the evil Absolute Unity's fleet now travels at full speed expanding the Core’s reach to the Outer Rim. The survivors once again stand on the brink of destruction.

The bravest veterans of the Division War joined forces and founded the NIGHTSTAR: a group of flying aces that are ready to rebel against the hunger of the machines.

The NIGHTSTAR has discovered a secret weapon that will put an end to the conflict. Now the very fate of the galaxy lies in the hands of these fearless pilots.



ABOUT NIGHTSTAR™: ROGUE WINGS

NIGHTSTAR: Rogue Wings is an ARCADE FLIGHT COMBAT GAME about rapid air battles and fast-paced missions. From third-person view or from an immersive cockpit view you will fight your way to rise up against an evil Artificial Intelligence that rules the galaxy! It takes you on a breathtaking journey with beautifully handcrafted environments, battleships, and enemy fighters. Playing as Commander Eastwood on a singleplayer campaign mode, your skills as a pilot will be put to the test while you learn secrets about your sworn enemy, the Absolute Unity through completing missions on all the 3 COMPLETE LEVELS available in this Early Access version. Triple-A art and effects, and state-of-the-art sound design await.



  • FIGHT. Rapid air battles and up-close dogfighting bring your skills as a pilot to the limit.
  • GET IMMERSED. This arcade flight combat game combines a unique target lock system and intense warfare.
  • UPGRADE. Collect resources and turn your ship into an unstoppable war machine. (HANGAR MODULE COMING SOON)
  • ENJOY. Revel in handcrafted scenarios with no procedurally generated content.
  • GO FULL THROTTLE. Your two wingmen will be on your side to teach the enemy a lesson they won’t forget.
  • BE A NIGHTSTAR: ROGUE WING. Scroll down for a backstory of what awaits.


What's available on Early Access:
  • Singleplayer campaign mode with 4 COMPLETE LEVELS
  • Tactical third person view AND immersive cockpit view
  • Unique flying mechanics
  • Triple-A art and effects
  • State-of-the-art sound design



Planned upcoming features
  • 9 complete levels with unique enemies and bosses
  • Full PlayStation®4 and Xbox One gamepad support
  • Even more weapons
  • Neat customization options
  • Dynamic open world missions
  • Steam Trading Cards and Achievements

short_description: NIGHTSTAR: Rogue Wings combines the best of two worlds: the crusade of a rogue group of mercenaries and the intricate machinations of the Absolute Unity, in a beautifully handcrafted ARCADE FLIGHT COMBAT GAME. Play as Commander Eastwood, a veteran of the Division Wars, and fight your way to rise up to the challenge against your worst enemy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 770 / AMD Radeon
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: 32/64-bit Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
